function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited livelihoods and savings may lead to economic vulnerability and inability to access vital resources like water.","Impact":"Disastrous impacts on income, employment, and ability to purchase vital resources.","Mitigation":"Development of emergency approaches, government compensation, strengthening social protection systems, and redeployment to response efforts.","Technologies":"Digital cash transfer systems, emergency compensation platforms, and social protection digital databases.","People":"People living in informal settlements, informal workers, and those with limited savings.","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and emergency response organizations."}]}
